definitions: To recognize or establish as being a particular person or thing; verify the identity of.
To associate (someone or something) closely with; regard as having an alliance or close connection with.
To establish the identity of; ascertain who or what (someone or something) is.
To find, discover, or pinpoint the presence or existence of.
examples: She was able to identify the suspect.
He identifies with the working class.
Can you identify the source of the problem?
Scientists identified a new species of bird.
